snippet: Hewlett-Packard plans to split into two companies. | Becton, Dickinson & Company is buying CareFusion for about $12 billion. | Bitcoin’s price tumbles. | Questioning a window for insider sales.
abstract: Hewlett-Packard plans to split into two companies. | Becton, Dickinson & Company is buying CareFusion for about $12 billion. | Bitcoin’s price tumbles. | Questioning a window for insider sales.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: HP Announces a Split
